summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 GREAT DANE TRAILER. THE EMERGENCY AIRLINE WAS FAILING AND WAS NOT HOLDING AIR, CAUSING THE BRAKES TO TURN ON AND WOULD EVENTUALLY CATCH FIRE. THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED WHO AGREE THAT THEY WERE FAILING, BUT INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE WARRANTY WAS NO LONGER VALID. THE CONTACT DID NOT INFORM THE MANUFACTURER NOR WAS THE VEHICLE REPAIRED. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE APPROXIMATELY 30,000. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.
